Summary Note:
The RM was introduced to Hortense Romane Thiry at a corporate retreat in Brussels. They participated in team-building activities and developed a strong rapport, which eventually led to a successful business partnership.
Hortense Romane Thiry is a 46 year old and comes from Belgium.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Hortense Romane Thiry has been happily married to Peeters since 2014. Together they have 2 kids called Joséphine and Adèle.
Education Background:
Hortense graduated from Onze-Lieve-Vrouwe-Wavercollege in 1998.
Hortense completed her university education at Thomas More University of Applied Sciences in 2002.
Occupation History:
Hortense Romane Thiry is a 46 year old Fleet Manager from Belgium. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Hortense Romane Thiry's first role was as a Ship Broker at CMB NV, where she worked diligently from 2003 to 2006 to establish a strong reputation.
In 2008, she moved to Wallenius Wilhelmsen Logistics Belgium NV to work as a Shipping Company Owner, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
In 2012, she joined NYK Line (Belgium) NV as a Fleet Manager, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped her grow both personally and professionally.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 400000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Roeselare, Wavre and Ostend, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
In 2006, she received an inheritance of 3420000 EUR from her late mother, who was a prominent Oil and Gas Executive, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
